home.text: Growing up it was always my dream to go into broadcasting. God had another direction for my path but many years later He has allowed me the opportunity to do something with that dream. So over a year ago I started recording a couple podcasts and I have fallen in love with it. It would be easy for me to tell you that I have a long way to go but it doesn't mean I can't enjoy doing it while learning along the way. I am currently hosting three different shows. Each are featured here. If you enjoy them please like, share and rate them. I also welcome any suggestions on show topics and people you know who would make great guests. Contact me by email @ rogtarheel@gmail.com or on my social media links below.
